notes.note:
Repaired certificate chain to [re-enable web extensions][1] that had been disabled


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/addons/2019/05/04/update-regarding-add-ons-in-firefox/

A small number of add-ons may be listed as unsupported or may not appear in about:addons. Their data is not lost; users should be able to re-install the add-ons and recover the data. ([Bug 1549129][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1549129

Themes may not be re-enabled. Users may need to re-enable them in about:addons. ([Bug 1549022][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1549022

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 66.0.4 Release
